title: Saddle blanket
description: saddle blanket, Hopi, so-called \"Divorce\" blanket with one half of the field in white and the other half in black; in the outer corners of the two fields, white on black and black on white, a bent stem terminating in three solid discs; edges overcast, corners finished with tassels of green and black wool
creditline: Gift of Mrs C. C. Bovey
